column1: Fuentes del Valle is the third-largest town in Tultitlán Municipality in Mexico State
column2: Mexico. The town is part of the Mexico City metropolitan area and had a 2010 census population of 74
column3: 087 inhabitants. The town lies near the northern tip of the Federal District (Distrito Federal)
column4: and between the larger Buenavista and San Pablo de las Salinas.
